description: Retrieves details about the specified Connector. Calling this action returns important details about the connector, such as the public SCEP URL where your clients can request certificates.

parameters.name: ConnectorArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the connector.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the connector.

nested_items.name: CertificateAuthorityArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the certificate authority associated with the connector.

nested_items.name: MobileDeviceManagement
nested_items.description: Contains settings relevant to the mobile device management system that you chose for the connector. If you didn't configure MobileDeviceManagement, then the connector is for general-purpose use and this object is empty.

nested_items.name: AzureApplicationId
nested_items.description: The directory (tenant) ID from your Microsoft Entra ID app registration.

nested_items.name: Domain
nested_items.description: The primary domain from your Microsoft Entra ID app registration.

nested_items.name: OpenIdConfiguration
nested_items.description: Contains OpenID Connect (OIDC) parameters for use with Connector for SCEP for Microsoft Intune. For more information about using Connector for SCEP for Microsoft Intune, see Using Connector for SCEP for Microsoft Intune.

nested_items.name: Issuer
nested_items.description: The issuer value to copy into your Microsoft Entra app registration's OIDC.

nested_items.name: Subject
nested_items.description: The subject value to copy into your Microsoft Entra app registration's OIDC.

nested_items.name: Audience
nested_items.description: The audience value to copy into your Microsoft Entra app registration's OIDC.

nested_items.name: StatusReason
nested_items.description: Information about why connector creation failed, if status is FAILED.

nested_items.name: Endpoint
nested_items.description: The connector's HTTPS public SCEP URL.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the connector was created.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the connector was updated.
